ygData.subject: RE: Missing bard songs (was Updated Song Analysis 21+)
ygData.msgSnippet: [snip] ... This is a reasonably safe assumption.  However, I think that there are a few stones left unturned (as far as new song abilities/effects go), so
ygData.messageBody:
[snip]

> So to sum it all up, I think it is more likely that our
> missing songs will
> be better versions/combos of our current songs versus songs
> that give us a
> new ability such as bind or gate. What does everyone else think?

This is a reasonably safe assumption. However, I think that there are a few
stones left unturned (as far as new song abilities/effects go), so there
might be a chance that we see something totally new - which would be great
IMO. Personally, I have this feeling that they're going to reorganize the
entire top-end of the song listing (30+). It doesn't make a lot of sense
the way it's configured now (IMO). It's kinda sad... after I hit 32 (which
should be later this week), I don't have any songs to _really_ look forward
to, other than the 48 and 50 songs. I know there are some good ones along
the way, but nothing compared to the "game winners" that we get below 32.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 31 Bard [Povar]

> Galtin of E'ci
